title: One change to make period of oscillation same

content.prompt: Two systems are in oscillation: a simple pendulum swinging back and forth through a very small angle and a block oscillating on a spring. The block-spring system takes twice as much time as the pendulum to complete one oscillation. Which of the following changes could make the two systems oscillate with the same period?

choices.label: Increasing the mass of the pendulum bob
Increasing the angle through which the pendulum swings by a small amount
Decreasing the mass of both the block and the pendulum bob

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
